name: addAdminAccessGroup
description: Adds a group as an admin group with the default admin rights.

name: addAdminAccessUser
description: Adds a user as administrator with the default admin rights.

name: addNewGroup
description: Add a new group to system's group list.

name: addNewInternalUser
description: Creates and sets up a new internal user account.

name: addNewSharedAccount
description: Create a new shared account with the given name.

name: addNewUser
description: Trigger the process of adding a new user account.

name: addNewUsers
description:
Calling this method will start a specialized user and group synchronization process optimized for tracking down
 adding any new users that exist in the OS/Network/Domain user directory and not in the system.

name: addPrinterAccessGroup
description: Adds the group to the printer access group list.

name: addPrinterGroup
description: Add a printer to a single printer group.

name: addSharedAccountAccessGroup
description: Allow the given group access to the given shared account without using a pin.

name: addSharedAccountAccessUser
description: Allow the given user access to the given shared account without using a pin.

name: addUserToGroup
description: Adds the user to the specified group.

name: adjustSharedAccountAccountBalance
description: Adjust a shared account's account balance by an adjustment amount.

name: adjustUserAccountBalance
description: Adjust a user's built-in/default account balance by an adjustment amount.

name: adjustUserAccountBalance
description: Adjust a user's account balance by an adjustment amount.

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceByCardNumber
description: Adjust a user's account balance.

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceByCardNumber
description: Adjust a user's account balance.

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceByGroup
description: Adjust the account balance of all users in a group by an adjustment amount.

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceByGroup
description: Adjust the account balance of all users in a group by an adjustment amount.

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceByGroupUpTo
description: Adjust the account balance of all users in a group by an adjustment amount.

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceByGroupUpTo
description: Adjust the account balance of all users in a group by an adjustment amount.

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceIfAvailable
description: Adjust a user's account balance by an adjustment amount (if there is credit available).

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceIfAvailable
description: Adjust a user's account balance by an adjustment amount (if there is credit available).

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceIfAvailableLeaveRemaining
description:
Adjust a user's account balance by an adjustment amount (if there is credit available to leave the specified
 amount still available in the account).

name: adjustUserAccountBalanceIfAvailableLeaveRemaining
description:
Adjust a user's account balance by an adjustment amount (if there is credit available to leave the specified
 amount still available in the account).

name: applyDeviceSettings
description:
Initiates an update to the device of any outstanding configuration changes
 applied via the set-printer-property or set-printer-properties commands

name: batchImportInternalUsers
description: Import the internal users contained in the given tab-delimited import file.

name: batchImportPrinters
description:
Updates printers based on the details contained in the given tab-delimited import file, creating them if
 required.

name: batchImportSharedAccounts
description: Import the shared accounts contained in the given tab-delimited import file.

name: batchImportUserCardIdNumbers
description: Import the user card/ID numbers and PINs contained in the given tab-delimited import file.

name: batchImportUsers
description: Import the user details contained in the given tab-delimited import file.

name: changeInternalAdminPassword
description: Change the internal admin password.

name: clearUserAdvancedPrinterSettings
description:
Clear the User's Advanced Printer Settings, settings cleared are: dont-hold-jobs-in-release-station,
 dont-apply-printer-filter-rules, printer-cost-adjustment-rate-percent, dont-archive, auto-release-jobs

name: createUserClientAccountsFile
description: Requests that the server create the client accounts to a file.

name: deleteExistingSharedAccount
description: Delete a shared account from the system.

name: deleteExistingUser
description: Delete/remove an existing user from the user list.

name: deleteExistingUser
description: Delete/remove an existing user from the user list.

name: deletePrinter
description: Delete a printer.

name: disableDeviceSnmpv3
description: Disable use of SNMPv3 on the device

name: disablePrinter
description: Disable a printer for select period of time.

name: disablePrinterSnmpv3
description: Disable use of SNMPv3 on the printer

name: disablePrintingForUser
description: Disable printing for a user.

name: disableSharedAccount
description: Disable shared account.

name: enableDeviceSnmpv3
description: Set the SNMPv3 device config details

name: enablePrinter
description: Enable a printer.

name: enablePrinterSnmpv3
description: Set the SNMPv3 printer config details

name: exportUserDataHistory
description:
Export user data based on a set of predefined CSV reports (The owner of these files will be the system account
 running the PaperCut process).

name: generateAdHocReport
description: Generates an AdHoc report

name: generateScheduledReport
description: Generate a specified scheduled report

name: getConfigValue
description: Get the config value from the server.

name: getDeviceSnmpv3
description: Get the SNMPv3 device config details

name: getGroupMembers
description: Retrieves a list of all users in the group.

name: getGroupQuota
description: Get the group quota allocation settings on a given group.

name: getPrinterCostSimple
description: Get the page cost if, and only if, the printer is using the Simple Charging Model.

name: getPrinterProperties
description: Get multiple printer properties at once (to save multiple calls).

name: getPrinterProperty
description: Gets a printer property.

name: getPrinterSnmpv3
description: Get the SNMPv3 printer config details

name: getSharedAccountAccountBalance
description: The current account balance associated with a shared account.

name: getSharedAccountOverdraftMode
description: Get the shared account's overdraft mode

name: getSharedAccountProperties
description: Get multiple shared account properties at once (to save multiple calls).

name: getSharedAccountProperty
description: Gets a shared account property.

name: getTaskStatus
description:
Return the status (completed flag and any status message text) associated with a long running task such as
 a sync operation started by the performGroupSync API.

name: getTotalUsers
description: Get the count of all users in the system.

name: getUserAccountBalance
description: The a user's current account balance.

name: getUserAccountBalance
description: The a user's current account balance.

name: getUserGroups
description: Retrieves a list of a user's group memberships.

name: getUserOverdraftMode
description: Get the user's overdraft mode

name: getUserProperties
description: Get multiple user properties at once (to save multiple calls).

name: getUserProperty
description: Gets a user property.

name: installLicense
description: Install a new license

name: isGroupExists
description: Checks if group exists or not.

name: isSharedAccountExists
description: Test to see if a shared account exists.

name: isUserExists
description: Test to see if a user associated with "username" exists in the system.

name: listPrinters
description: List all printers sorted by printer name.

name: listSharedAccounts
description: List all shared accounts (sorted by account name) starting at offset and ending at limit.

name: listUserAccounts
description: List all user accounts (sorted by username) starting at offset and ending at limit.

name: listUserGroups
description: List user groups.

name: listUserSharedAccounts
description:
List all shared accounts (sorted by account name) that the user has access to, starting at offset
 and listing only limit accounts.

name: listUserSharedAccounts
description:
List all shared accounts (sorted by account name) that the user has access to, starting at offset
 and listing only limit accounts.

name: lookUpUserNameByCardNo
description: Looks up the user with the given user card number and returns their user name.

name: lookUpUserNameByEmail
description: Looks up the user with the given email and returns their user name.

name: lookUpUserNameByIDNo
description: Looks up the user with the given user id number and returns their user name.

name: lookUpUserNameBySecondaryUserName
description: Looks up the user with the specified secondary user name and returns their  primary user name.

name: lookUpUsersByFullName
description: Looks up the users with the given full name and returns their user names.

name: performGroupSync
description: Start the process of synchronizing the system's group membership with the OS/Network/Domain's group membership.

name: performOnlineBackup
description: Instigate an online backup.

name: performUserAndGroupSync
description: Start a full user and group synchronization.

name: performUserAndGroupSyncAdvanced
description: An advanced version of the user and group synchronization process providing control over the sync behaviour.

name: processJob
description: Takes the details of a job and logs and charges as if it were a "real" job.

name: reapplyInitialUserSettings
description: Re-applies initial user settings on the given user.

name: removeAdminAccessGroup
description: Removes a group from the list of admin groups.

name: removeAdminAccessUser
description: Removes an admin user from the list of admins.

name: removeGroup
description: Removes an  already existing group.

name: removePrinterAccessGroup
description: Removes the group from the printer access group list.

name: removeSharedAccountAccessGroup
description: Revoke the given group's access to the given shared account.

name: removeSharedAccountAccessUser
description: Revoke the given user's access to the given shared account.

name: removeUserFromGroup
description: Removes the user from the specified group.

name: renamePrinter
description: Rename a printer.

name: renameSharedAccount
description: Rename an existing shared account.

name: renameUserAccount
description: Rename a user account.

name: resetPrinterCounts
description: Reset the counts (pages and job counts) associated with a printer.

name: resetUserCounts
description: Reset the counts (pages and job counts) associated with a user account.

name: runCommand
description: Runs a custom command on the server.

name: saveThreadSnapshot
description: Saves the server thread snapshot to the debug log.

name: setConfigValue
description: Set the config value from the server.

name: setGroupQuota
description: Set the group quota allocation settings on a given group.

name: setPrinterCostSimple
description: Method to set a simple single page cost using the Simple Charging Model.

name: setPrinterGroups
description: Set the printer groups a printer belongs to, overwriting any existing group.

name: setPrinterProperties
description: Set multiple printer properties at once (to save multiple calls).

name: setPrinterProperty
description: Sets a printer property.

name: setSharedAccountAccountBalance
description: Set the balance on a shared account to a set value.

name: setSharedAccountOverdraftMode
description: Set the shared account's overdraft mode

name: setSharedAccountProperties
description: Set multiple shared account properties at once (to save multiple calls).

name: setSharedAccountProperty
description: Sets a shared account property.

name: setUserAccountBalance
description: Set the balance on a user's account to a set value.

name: setUserAccountBalance
description: Set the balance on a user's account to a set value.

name: setUserAccountBalanceByGroup
description: Set the balance for each member of a group to the given value.

name: setUserAccountBalanceByGroup
description: Set the balance for each member of a group to the given value.

name: setUserAccountSelectionAdvancedPopup
description: Change a user's account selection setting to use the advanced account selection pop-up.

name: setUserAccountSelectionAutoChargePersonal
description: Sets the user to auto charge to it's personal account.

name: setUserAccountSelectionAutoSelectSharedAccount
description: Change a user's account selection setting to automatically charge to a single shared account.

name: setUserAccountSelectionStandardPopup
description: Change a user's account selection setting to use the standard account selection pop-up.

name: setUserOverdraftMode
description: Set the user's overdraft mode

name: setUserProperties
description: Set multiple user properties at once (to save multiple calls).

name: setUserProperty
description: Sets a user property.

name: syncGroup
description: Syncs an existing group with the configured directory server, updates the group membership.

name: useCard
description: Add the value of the a card to a user's account.
